sig_info: When any Non-Science Opponent has specific Buffs active, gain a unique effect. Potency is increased by 100% when fighting Cosmic Champions.
Regen: Reduce Opponents Regen Rate by 10 to 35%.
Power Gain: Reduce Opponent's Ability Power Rate by 10 to 35%.
Fury: Gain 177.86 to 861.69 Armor Rating.
Armor Up: Gain 8.4 to 29.4 Attack Rating.
Precision: Gain 177.86 to 861.69 Critcal Resistance.
Cruelty: Gain 10 to 35% Critical Damage Resistance.

PASSIVE: Dragon Man’s thick Armor and Advanced Robotics grants full immunity to Bleed, Poison, and Armor Shattered.
If under the effects of an Armor Break, Dragon Man releases currents of mystical energy, dealing 4.2 Degeneration Damage every 0.5 seconds. Damage is increased by 100% against Cosmic Champions.
Offensive Combat Power Rate is reduced by 35%.
POWER CHARGE - BUFF:: At the start of a fight, gain Power Charge, generating 12% of a bar of Power every second. Power Charge is removed when Stunned.
If 0 Power Charges are active, create one after 12 seconds. When Defending, this duration is reduced by 4 seconds.
When fighting Science Champions, upon receiving a Non-Damaging Debuff, pause cooldown Duration for 0.35 seconds.
CORNERED - PASSIVE:: While the Opponent’s back is against the wall they gain Cornered. Cornered is unaffected by Ability Accuracy modifications.
Each hit deals 29.4 physical damage. This damage is increased by 35% for each Ineptitude or Unique Buff on the Opponent. Up to 105%
Opponents Defensive Combat Power Rate is reduced by 70% while above 2 bars of Power.
ON OPPONENT KNOCKDOWN:: Gain an Unblockable Buff for 3 seconds. Duration is paused during Special Attacks.
HEAVY ATTACKS: On Hit, remove any Incinerates on the Opponent, each dealing a burst of 42 energy damage. If 6 or more Incinerates are removed, this damage is increased by 50%.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: The final hit inflicts a non-stacking Slow for 8 seconds.
The first hit that contacts the Opponent consumes 1 Power Charge to inflict an Ineptitude Debuff reducing the potency of new Fury, Armor Up, Precision, and Cruelty Buffs by 75% for 30 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: All 3 hits of Dragon Man’s fire breath inflict Incinerate, dealing 42 energy damage over 25 seconds. Incinerate also reduces the Opponent’s Block Proficiency by 50% and prevents the activation of Perfect Block.
Consume 1 Power Charge to generate a Fury Buff, increasing Attack Rating by 54.6 for 30 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Consume all stacks of Power Charge. Each contributing 4 seconds to an Unstoppable Buff. While active, this Unstoppable instantly regenerates 85% of hit damage received from all attacks other than Special 3’s.
After this Special Attack ends, generate 3 stacks of Power Charge. Additional stacks of Power Charge do not generate additional Power.

sig_info: When any Non-Science Opponent has specific Buffs active, gain a unique effect. Potency is increased by 100% when fighting Cosmic Champions.

Fury: Gain 183.42 to 888.61 Armor Rating.

Precision: Gain 183.42 to 888.61 Critcal Resistance.
Cruelty: Gain 10 to 35% Critical Damage Resistance.

PASSIVE: Dragon Man’s thick Armor and Advanced Robotics grants full immunity to Bleed, Poison, and Armor Shattered.
If under the effects of an Armor Break, Dragon Man releases currents of mystical energy, dealing 5.55 Degeneration Damage every 0.5 seconds. Damage is increased by 100% against Cosmic Champions.
Offensive Combat Power Rate is reduced by 35%.
POWER CHARGE - BUFF:: At the start of a fight, gain Power Charge, generating 12% of a bar of Power every second. Power Charge is removed when Stunned.
If 0 Power Charges are active, create one after 12 seconds. When Defending, this duration is reduced by 4 seconds.

CORNERED - PASSIVE:: While the Opponent’s back is against the wall they gain Cornered. Cornered is unaffected by Ability Accuracy modifications.
Each hit deals 38.85 physical damage. This damage is increased by 35% for each Ineptitude or Unique Buff on the Opponent. Up to 105%
Opponents Defensive Combat Power Rate is reduced by 70% while above 2 bars of Power.
ON OPPONENT KNOCKDOWN:: Gain an Unblockable Buff for 3 seconds. Duration is paused during Special Attacks.
HEAVY ATTACKS: On Hit, remove any Incinerates on the Opponent, each dealing a burst of 55.5 energy damage. If 6 or more Incinerates are removed, this damage is increased by 50%.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: The final hit inflicts a non-stacking Slow for 8 seconds.
The first hit that contacts the Opponent consumes 1 Power Charge to inflict an Ineptitude Debuff reducing the potency of new Fury, Armor Up, Precision, and Cruelty Buffs by 75% for 30 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: All 3 hits of Dragon Man’s fire breath inflict Incinerate, dealing 55.5 energy damage over 25 seconds. Incinerate also reduces the Opponent’s Block Proficiency by 50% and prevents the activation of Perfect Block.

SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Consume all stacks of Power Charge. Each contributing 4 seconds to an Unstoppable Buff. While active, this Unstoppable instantly regenerates 85% of hit damage received from all attacks other than Special 3’s.
After this Special Attack ends, generate 3 stacks of Power Charge. Additional stacks of Power Charge do not generate additional Power.

Power Gain: Reduce Opponent's Ability Power Rate by 10 to 35%.
Fury: Gain 222.32 to 1077.11 Armor Rating.
Armor Up: Gain 117.15 to 409.9 Attack Rating.
Precision: Gain 222.32 to 1077.11 Critcal Resistance.
Cruelty: Gain 10 to 35% Critical Damage Resistance.

PASSIVE: Dragon Man’s thick Armor and Advanced Robotics grants full immunity to Bleed, Poison, and Armor Shattered.
If under the effects of an Armor Break, Dragon Man releases currents of mystical energy, dealing 58.55 Degeneration Damage every 0.5 seconds. Damage is increased by 100% against Cosmic Champions.
Offensive Combat Power Rate is reduced by 35%.
POWER CHARGE - BUFF:: At the start of a fight, gain Power Charge, generating 12% of a bar of Power every second. Power Charge is removed when Stunned.
If 0 Power Charges are active, create one after 12 seconds. When Defending, this duration is reduced by 4 seconds.
When fighting Science Champions, upon receiving a Non-Damaging Debuff, pause cooldown Duration for 0.35 seconds.
CORNERED - PASSIVE:: While the Opponent’s back is against the wall they gain Cornered. Cornered is unaffected by Ability Accuracy modifications.
Each hit deals 409.85 physical damage. This damage is increased by 35% for each Ineptitude or Unique Buff on the Opponent. Up to 105%
Opponents Defensive Combat Power Rate is reduced by 70% while above 2 bars of Power.
ON OPPONENT KNOCKDOWN:: Gain an Unblockable Buff for 3 seconds. Duration is paused during Special Attacks.
HEAVY ATTACKS: On Hit, remove any Incinerates on the Opponent, each dealing a burst of 585.5 energy damage. If 6 or more Incinerates are removed, this damage is increased by 50%.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: The final hit inflicts a non-stacking Slow for 8 seconds.
The first hit that contacts the Opponent consumes 1 Power Charge to inflict an Ineptitude Debuff reducing the potency of new Fury, Armor Up, Precision, and Cruelty Buffs by 75% for 30 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: All 3 hits of Dragon Man’s fire breath inflict Incinerate, dealing 585.5 energy damage over 25 seconds. Incinerate also reduces the Opponent’s Block Proficiency by 50% and prevents the activation of Perfect Block.
Consume 1 Power Charge to generate a Fury Buff, increasing Attack Rating by 761.15 for 30 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Consume all stacks of Power Charge. Each contributing 4 seconds to an Unstoppable Buff. While active, this Unstoppable instantly regenerates 85% of hit damage received from all attacks other than Special 3’s.
After this Special Attack ends, generate 3 stacks of Power Charge. Additional stacks of Power Charge do not generate additional Power.
